title: Everquest Underfoot Client for The Grand Creation server
description:
This is the Underfoot client for PEQ The Grand Creation server. 

There are many reasons to upgrade from a Titanium client, namely being able to use things like Lay on Hands again and having higher HP/Mana values for your characters.

This torrent includes a compilation of bug fixes, such as fixed Drakkin animations and AA abilities. I've also added higher quality textures for classic models, armored froglok models, removed a few annoying sounds like thunder and pet laughing, and added a great custom interface that is optional to use.

Installation instructions : 
1. Unzip this bad boy to your C drive. 

2. Go inside the folder and find EQGAME.EXE, right click it make a shortcut for your desktop. 
It is very critical that you choose EQGAME.EXE instead of EVERQUEST.EXE, because choosing the wrong one will open up the patcher and fuck up your installation.

3. Right click your new desktop shortcut and add patchme to the end of your target box.
